mapper.insert: INSERT INTO achievement_badge (badge_name, description, icon_url, condition_type, condition_value, level, reward_points, badge_type, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{badgeName}, #{description}, #{iconUrl}, #{conditionType}, #{conditionValue}, #{level}, #{rewardPoints}, #{badgeType}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE achievement_badge SET badge_name = #{badgeName}, description = #{description}, icon_url = #{iconUrl}, condition_type = #{conditionType}, condition_value = #{conditionValue}, level = #{level}, reward_points = #{rewardPoints}, badge_type = #{badgeType}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE badge_id = #{badgeId}
UPDATE achievement_badge SET status = 0, update_time = NOW() WHERE badge_id = #{badgeId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM achievement_badge WHERE condition_type = #{conditionType} AND status = 1
SELECT * FROM achievement_badge WHERE level = #{level} AND status = 1
SELECT * FROM achievement_badge WHERE badge_type = #{badgeType} AND status = 1
